00019 namespace INETFw // load headers into a namespace, to avoid conflicts with platform definitions of the same stuff

00027 #include "UDPSerializer.h"

00029 #include "TCPIPchecksum.h"
00030 
00031 #if !defined(_WIN32) && !defined(__WIN32__) && !defined(WIN32) && !defined(__CYGWIN__) && !defined(_WIN64)
00032 #include <netinet/in.h>  // htonl, ntohl, ...
00033 #endif

00036 using namespace INETFw;
00037 
00038 
00039 int UDPSerializer::serialize(const UDPPacket *pkt, unsigned char *buf, unsigned int bufsize)
00040 {
00041     struct udphdr *udphdr = (struct udphdr *) (buf);
00042     int packetLength;
00043 
00044     packetLength = pkt->getByteLength();
00045     udphdr->uh_sport = htons(pkt->getSourcePort());
00046     udphdr->uh_dport = htons(pkt->getDestinationPort());
00047     udphdr->uh_ulen  = htons(packetLength);
00048     udphdr->uh_sum   = TCPIPchecksum::checksum(buf, packetLength);
00049     return packetLength;
00050 }
00051 
00052 void UDPSerializer::parse(const unsigned char *buf, unsigned int bufsize, UDPPacket *dest)
00053 {
00054 
00055     struct udphdr *udphdr = (struct udphdr*) buf;
00056 
00057     dest->setSourcePort(ntohs(udphdr->uh_sport));
00058     dest->setDestinationPort(ntohs(udphdr->uh_dport));
00059     dest->setByteLength(8);
00060     cPacket *encapPacket = new cPacket("Payload-from-wire");
00061     encapPacket->setByteLength(ntohs(udphdr->uh_ulen) - sizeof(struct udphdr));
00062     dest->encapsulate(encapPacket);
00063     dest->setName(encapPacket->getName());
00064 }
